A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A huge disappointment.  Weak storyline\, goose-chase side missions that went nowhere (with corney creatures and aliens). Terribly placed sarcasm and quips inside already stale dialogue. Not to mention Leia's Mary Poppins-like space walk.   My eyes were tired from all the rolling half way through. Luke's broody island was a disaster of unnessesaryness. Snoke was not frightening\, and brought down with a yawn. In summary \"We need to get a way. Ok we got away. The end\". Please come back JJ
